name: NEFilterManager
desc: An object to create and manage a content filterâ€™s configuration.

items.name: class func shared() -> NEFilterManager
items.desc: Access the single instance of NEFilterManager.

items.name: func loadFromPreferences(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Load the filter configuration from the Network Extension preferences.

items.name: func saveToPreferences(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Save the filter configuration in the Network Extension preferences.

items.name: func removeFromPreferences(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Remove the filter configuration from the Network Extension preferences.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean used to toggle the enabled state of the filter.

items.name: var providerConfiguration: NEFilterProviderConfiguration?
items.desc: A NEFilterProviderConfiguration object containing the filter configuration settings.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String?
items.desc: A string containing a description of the filter configuration.

items.name: var grade: NEFilterManager.Grade
items.desc: The grade of the filter, which determines when it acts relative to other filters.

items.name: enum NEFilterManager.Grade
items.desc: A type for the grade or priority of the filter.

items.name: static let NEFilterConfigurationDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted after the filter configuration stored in the Network Extension preferences changes.
